name: Dave's Single®
description: A quarter-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun — just the way Dave intended.
titleTag: Dave's Single Fresh Hamburgers - Hamburger Restaurant - Wendy's
metaDescription: We make Dave proud with our Dave's Single hamburger loaded with toppings and hand-crafted from a quarter pound of fresh 100% North American beef

name: Dave's Double®
description: A half-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun. More meat means more to love.
titleTag: Dave's Double Fresh Hamburgers - Hamburger Restaurant - Wendy's
metaDescription: We make Dave proud with our Dave's Double hamburger loaded with toppings and hand-crafted from a half pound of fresh 100% North American beef.

name: Dave's Triple®
description: Three quarters of a pound* of fresh, never frozen beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun. Use both hands!
titleTag: Dave's Triple Fresh Hamburgers - Hamburger Restaurant - Wendy's
metaDescription: We make Dave proud with our Dave's Triple hamburger loaded with toppings and hand-crafted from a three-quarter pound of fresh 100% North American beef.

name: Baconator®
description: A half-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, 6 pieces of crispy Applewood smoked bacon, ketchup, and mayo. Carnivores rejoice!
titleTag: Premium Double Bacon Burger with Fresh Hamburger Meat - Wendy's
metaDescription: Enjoy bacon? Order the Baconator bacon cheeseburger from Wendy's today! Made with two 1/4 lb. fresh, never frozen, 100%  North American beef patties.

name: Son of Baconator®
description: Two patties of fresh, never frozen beef, American cheese, plenty of Applewood smoked bacon, ketchup, and mayo. Like Baconator®, like Son.
titleTag: Delicious Double Bacon Burger with Fresh Hamburger Meat - Wendy's
metaDescription: Enjoy bacon? Order the Son of Baconator bacon cheeseburger from Wendy's. Made with fresh, never frozen, 100%  North American beef to meet your standards.
